ygData.subject: Re: Crystal Cavern
ygData.msgSnippet: It would depend on your view of the game.  I wouldn t hunt any of the Light races just because of the roleplay aspect.  But that s just me.  But I do
ygData.messageBody:
It would depend on your view of the game. I wouldn't hunt any of
the "Light" races just because of the roleplay aspect. But that's
just me. But I do remember seeing trains of Dorfs following a wolf.

Do you have LoY? Gunthak is in your level, plenty of mobs and a good
spawn rate. From there you can move on to Dulak and work the yard,
then the boats. And they drop gems! I usually stagger out of there
with 200-300 plat in items and gems, after a group split!

And Druids do have a role in LDoN. I know you don't like to group,
but you're missing a lot. Just be careful. I've gotten a few
questionable groups, with the usual dire results.

Tuldayen Grimblade
Pathfinder of Tunare
Terris-Thule, Summoners of the Realm

--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Don Gibson <hoggtyed@y...> wrote:
> I lved my druid to from 39 to 50 on the dwarven
> citizens in Butcher Block mountains There are 13 of
> them on citizen faction, there faction hit does not
> effect guards or your faction needed for your epic.
> They drop ringmail, finesteel, up to 5pp and always a
> bronze axe. I average around 30pp per quad. If you
> want I can show you which ones and how to pull them.
> Just shoot me an email. hoggtyed@y...
>
>
> Hogg
